sources.name: Cumulative CO2 by nation- CDIAC
sources.description:
Data published by Carbon Dioxide Information Analysis Centre (CDIAC)
Data publisher's source Tom Boden and Bob Andres (Oak Ridge National Laboratory); Gregg Marland (Appalachian State University)
Link http://cdiac.ornl.gov/
Retrieved 2017-04-25

Data converted from carbon into carbon dioxide (using conversion factor of 3.67). Raw data converted from thousand tonnes to million tonnes. Data for Australia appears to be negative from 1851-1858; for clarity, these figures have been renormalised to zero.

variables.name: Cumulative CO2 by nation- CDIAC
variables.description: Cumulative CO2 by nation (million tonnes) since 1751-CDIAC
